title: Stepan Surikov
text:
Stepan Vladislavovich Surikov (; born 30 January 2002) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Rubin%20Kazan">FC Rubin Kazan</a>.
Club career.
He was first called up to the senior squad of <a href="FC%20Rubin%20Kazan">FC Rubin Kazan</a> in November 2020. He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> for Rubin on 13 September 2021 in a game against <a href="FC%20Ural%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural Yekaterinburg</a>.
